query.value:
select BRAND_CODE as BRAND_CODE,  REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2,3,4,5]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_month_brand_price_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE >= to_char(now() - interval '1 month', 'YYYYMM')
;

select BRAND_CODE as BRAND_CODE,  REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[1,2]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_month_brand_price_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE >= to_char(now() - interval '1 month', 'YYYYMM')
;

select BRAND_CODE as BRAND_CODE,  REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2,3,4,5]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_month_brand_price_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE = '202507'
;

query.value:
WITH vw_range AS (
    SELECT 
        (g * 1000 + 1) AS st,
        ((g + 1) * 1000) AS ed
    FROM generate_series(0, @{variables('total_count')}) AS g
)
SELECT r.st, r.ed
FROM vw_range r
;

WITH vw_range AS (
    SELECT 
        (g * 1000 + 1) AS st,
        ((g + 1) * 1000) AS ed
    FROM generate_series(0, @{variables('total_count')}) AS g
)
SELECT r.st, r.ed
FROM vw_range r
;

WITH vw_range AS (
    SELECT 
        (g * 1000 + 1) AS st,
        ((g + 1) * 1000) AS ed
    FROM generate_series(0, @{variables('total_count')}) AS g
)
SELECT r.st, r.ed
FROM vw_range r
;

source.query:
select case when coalesce (max(cast(st as numeric)), 0) = 0 then 1
            else coalesce (max(cast(st as numeric)), 0) + 1000
            end as st
            ,
        case when coalesce (max(cast(ed as numeric)), 0) = 0 then 1000
            else coalesce (max(cast(ed as numeric)), 0) + 1000
            end as ed
from cd_ods.tb_fsk_i0300 
where evl_yr  = '2025';

query.value:
select case when coalesce (max(cast(st as numeric)), 0) = 0 then 1
            else coalesce (max(cast(st as numeric)), 0) + 1000
            end as st
            ,
        case when coalesce (max(cast(ed as numeric)), 0) = 0 then 1000
            else coalesce (max(cast(ed as numeric)), 0) + 1000
            end as ed
from cd_ods.tb_fsk_i0310
where EVL_YR = '@{variables('yyyy')}'
;

select case when coalesce (max(cast(st as numeric)), 0) = 0 then 1
            else coalesce (max(cast(st as numeric)), 0) + 1000
